scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "pnpm run serve:catalog" "pnpm run serve:cart" "pnpm run dev:host"
scripts.build:start: pnpm run build:remotes && concurrently --kill-others "pnpm run serve:catalog" "pnpm run serve:cart" "pnpm run dev:host"
scripts.build:remotes: pnpm --filter @ecommerce/shared build && pnpm --filter @ecommerce/product-catalog build && pnpm --filter @ecommerce/shopping-cart build
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:remotes && pnpm run build:host
scripts.serve:catalog: cd packages/product-catalog && pnpm exec vite preview --port 3001 --strictPort
scripts.serve:cart: cd packages/shopping-cart && pnpm exec vite preview --port 3002 --strictPort
scripts.serve:host: cd packages/host && pnpm exec vite preview --port 3000 --strictPort
scripts.preview: pnpm run build:all && concurrently --kill-others "pnpm run serve:catalog" "pnpm run serve:cart" "pnpm run serve:host"
scripts.validate: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run lint && pnpm run format:check && pnpm run test
scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rimraf node_modules dist .vite && rimraf node_modules
